Package index

All functions

addSampleData
Add a sample with SNP data to the variantCell project
aggregateByGroup
aggregateByGroup: Aggregate SNP data by cell groups
buildSNPDatabase
Build a unified SNP database from all samples
downsampleVariant
downsampleVariant: Downsample Cells by Group to Balance Cell Numbers
findDESNPs
findDESNPs: Cell-Level Differential SNP Expression Analysis
findSNPsByGroup
findSNPsByGroup: Group-Level SNP Presence Analysis
getCurrentIdentity
getCurrentIdentity: Get Current Project-Wide Cell Identity Information
plotSNPHeatmap
plotSNPHeatmap: Create a heatmap visualization of SNP expression across cell groups
plotSNPs
plotSNPs "Visualize SNP Distribution for a Gene"
process_tsv
process_tsv: Process a TSV file with prefix addition
process_vireo_dataframe
process_vireo_dataframe: Integrate Vireo donor assignments with a metadata data frame
process_vireo_sce
process_vireo_sce: Integrate Vireo donor assignments with a SingleCellExperiment object
process_vireo_seurat
process_vireo_seurat: Integrate Vireo donor assignments with a Seurat object
setProjectIdentity
setProjectIdentity: Set Project-Wide Cell Identity Variable
subsetVariantCell
subsetVariantCell: Subset Cells Based on Metadata Values
